message.content:
cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.SE, cs.SY

Reasoning: The paper proposes a decision-analytical approach to comparing the flexibility of decision situations, which involves modeling uncertainty and risk-aversion. This suggests a focus on artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and decision-making (cs.DS), as well as machine learning (cs.LG) and software engineering (cs.SE) for implementing the approach. The concept of flexibility also relates to control systems (cs.SY), which could be relevant for analyzing and optimizing decision-making processes.
